website_summaries.verdict: This popular ocean-themed soother delights parents as much as it does babies by washing away bedtime blues. Great for tots who won't go down without a fight.
pros: Soft lights, gently swaying sea creatures, ocean sounds, and soothing classical music help make bedtime more appealing
Music gradually becomes softer in 10-minute increments to help babies fall and stay asleep
4 modes allow for use with or without lights and movement
cons: Some babies enjoy the lights and movement so much they might stay up just to watch a little longer

customer_reviews.title: Great in the car!
customer_reviews.text: We use this in the car. We attached it to the head rest and our baby loves it. She's 8 months now and enjoys turning it on and off with her foot! The remote makes it a game between her and I. Makes errand runs and traveling to see family a whole lot better with her distracted.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT... until
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for our first kid in 2016, he still uses it to this day. Since the battery door has the mount behind it anyway we just don’t even bother putting the screws in, makes for easy battery changes, which happen FAR TOO OFTEN. He loves it and we love it, so we just purchased one for our newest baby. Something must have happened with production in the last two years. The songs are all different. They are loud (even on the lowest volume) and sound too harsh to even be considered soothing. I’m contemplating returning and finding something else that is quieter.
customer_reviews.author: thatgirl_nean

customer_reviews.title: Great soother, Son loves it! Just a few design flaws
customer_reviews.text: We love this soother. Our 6mo son loves it and often activates it on his own and it does exactly what we wanted to, which is help him fall back asleep. Just a few issues, 1: the remote is useless and never works. 2: Even on the lower setting it is quite loud, we solved that problem with a cotton ball taped to the speaker. 3: the strap is not long enough to go around our crib edge (Eco Chic). had to buy a longer strap to trade out from hobby lobby.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my 9 month old
customer_reviews.text: she likes to play with it and even though it took her a while she went to sleep with no crying which is exactly what I was hoping to accomplish.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Micheal

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them and they last a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these four years ago for my first grandchild. He still loves it enough to have it hanging on his bed. I had to get another for the new grandchild, because he loves his brothers aquarium. It has different features than the first one, so that makes it even nicer! These are awesome for kids that fight to go to sleep, they are relaxing and interesting for them to watch. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Herron

customer_reviews.title: the sound!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I chose excitedly and looked forward to the toy. the animals and the design seem fascinating to me, but I found a defect that makes it impossible; the sound of the engine !!! first I thought my toy would be wrong but I did a little more research and it's like that !!!I can not believe it! a toy so cute designed to accompany a baby with that unbearable engine .. a failure in the creation of the product.and a pity for those who buy it expecting something nice and now we have a toy that we will not use.
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: Battery Acid spashed on my daughter and I!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this for my 7 month old. When it arrived we opened the back panel to put batteries in and battery juice slashed up onto my child's face and onto my hands. There were already old batteries inside, which had a brown liquid leaking out onto them. Very scary wondering if my child's skin will be affected by the acid. Not cool at all. Not sure what to do with the product now.
customer_reviews.author: Java R.

customer_reviews.title: Best white noise ever
customer_reviews.text: Puts my baby right to sleep and also a great stepping stool for baby apparently. It's an amazing white noise and very soothing. All of my nieces and nephews had one so I knew when we started sleep training that I would be getting one for my first baby. He was 6 months old when I got it and learned very quickly how to push the button himself when he woke up in the middle of the night. Hes 9 months now and has gotten very creative with its use.
customer_reviews.author: SteveB

customer_reviews.title: Ordered open box, remote missing
customer_reviews.text: To save $7 I ordered this open box, it was Amazon Warehouse certified to be in like new condition. It came with a few scuffs on the front, which is fine, not like a baby cares. But what frustrates me is the remote was missing! I was desperate, so I kept the product but disappionted as I chose this item specifically for the remote. It is very bright, too bright in my opinion. But does the job. My 6 month old seemed terrified of his crib and now lies contently in it. The music and sounds can lull him to sleep and when he’s feeling playful, he enjoys kicking the button to turn it on and off.
customer_reviews.author: H. Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Definitely!! Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to get this. I should've gotten this from day 1. It's everything. It's biggest help came to us during Irma when the power was out for quite awhile both during and after the storm. (This gadget completely distracted baby from the house shaking during the eye wall.) She loves it. I love it. It's half off on here! Of all the baby products and gadgets and gear, this is one of the most useful I have found as a first timer.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A.

customer_reviews.title: Product advertised as new but was used
customer_reviews.text: Received product... it was used. Pull tab for demo was missing. Remote is missing. Can tell it was used because all the pieces inside of the box that keeps the item in place has been pulled out. Item just put in box without any packaging. Normally may let that slide, but since the remote is missing, I'm upset. Under the turtles fin, it looked "rubbed" like it ran too long. Product has dirt around the buttons, the part that attaches to the crib is sticky, with someone's hair stuck to it. Buttons are coated in finger prints that's dirty and oily.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Chenez

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Motor for animal movement is super loud..turtle has scratched big circle in background ..had to put tape over the speaker bc even the low volume setting was too loud. . .had to make my own strap (crib attachment) for the back bc the one on it was only about 4 inches long and wouldn't attach (go around) anything..let alone my son's nice wooden crib...remote never worked..box was messed up when it came in...but (after the tape was placed over the speaker) the music is good..stays on for about 15-20 minutes..and the light seems adequate for a baby
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I could not recommend this to anyone.........
customer_reviews.text: The 4 C batteries inside this toy were all corroded and the inside was a mess full of brown liquid gunk. I was going to put in the new C batteries that I bought but the inside was such a mess I wanted to hurl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This item is great for the daytime I would say it because they ...
customer_reviews.text: This item is great for the daytime I would say it because they has a high and medium volume. It only has two settings I wouldn't say it has a low volume because even the medium is a little loud, definitely too loud for night time and the light is way too bright wakes your child up more than it will actually soothe them back to sleep. Therefore I do not recommend this for nighttime or daytime as it will not work for what I bought it for witches night time I gave it to 3 because it's a beautiful product but if they can adjust the volume it would be a perfect car and dim the light also.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Loved it...until loud screeching sound
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing- still at 2.5. He wakes up sometimes at night and just turns it on and goes back to sleep. It is amazing and even my 5 year old (in the same room) loves it. The bad thing is his is our third one in 2.5 Years a s now it is making a horrible screeching sound when either of the light settings are on which of course is what he prefers. I don’t want to have to buy another one, but now he is hooked and it makes our lives easier. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: JennaVieve

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing soother and the colors and music are incredible. I would give it 6 stars if I could. My grand daughter loves it. She is 5 months old and for months I would lay it next to her and she would watch the animals move around. Now that she is older she touches the star and turns it on herself. A wonderful gift for any baby . Would recommend for a baby shower gift or just because gift. I purchased it for a Halloween gift for my then 2 month old grand daughter. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Fascinates my baby; drains batteries too quick
customer_reviews.text: Got my baby's attention, it didn't make her sleepy the first time we used it but made her more awake. I think she likes it. It uses the batteries too quick, i hope that it came with a charger to save me from buying batteries I like that the music fades to put my baby into a good sleep, i hope that it came with a timer setting so i can set how long i want it playing. What i do is go back to my baby's room after 20 mins before it turns off so it will extend
customer_reviews.author: Cc bear

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves this.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace the one I received as a gift at my baby shower. The old one was a piece of junk from the start, but my baby loved it so much we dealt with it. It was loud, music was obnoxious, and we replaced it finally because it would randomly turn off and have the battery life indicator light on, even with brand new batteries. THIS one is very pleasant sounding, and the remote even works! Guessing the first one I had was a dud. I'll update this after one month of use to review battery life and overall happiness with the new unit.
customer_reviews.author: JBoydTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Only problem was the battery connection was short ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only problem was the battery connection was short so I used tinfoil to create it. They had batteries in it, it worked when delivered, but when I changes, it stopped. Thought it was the batteries until I investigated the connections. Tinfoil works fine. The batteries last much longer in the second one that i got. The first one, the belt broke that controlled the animals from moving. I was able to replace it with a band from a whiteout roller. The kids both loved this, 9 months to 3 years. Helps calm them. I suggest getting recharable batteries for this, it always seemed like the high ebd durecell batteries would run out quickly in this.
customer_reviews.author: L. Leedle

customer_reviews.title: Best music box ever for a child.  We own three for our grandson
customer_reviews.text: Best music box ever for a child. Our family owns three for one grandson. One at his home, one at grandparents, and one for the farm. Soothing music and light. Easy to operate at an early age. Hangs sturdily on the side of the bed. Our grandson is now 14 months and when he first awakens he turns it on. We can hear it come on and know he is about ready for his day to begin, so get prepared. Also at night if he awakens he hits the star button and it turns on a soft light that allows him to find his own pacifiers.
customer_reviews.author: Rambling in Uwharrie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, we had the previous model of this eleven years ago for our son now we have this one for our baby girl. This thing is great, the remote works like a dream. We keep it hanging on the outside of her door so we can crack open the door and turn it on. I love that you can have just the lights on or lights and music or lights and water sounds.
customer_reviews.author: TessV84

customer_reviews.title: Great for helping baby sleep
customer_reviews.text: As with almost every baby, my little girl loves to fight naps/sleeps. This device is a great distraction when it comes to nap time because my daughter loves staring at it and listening to the music. It's soothing and the feature which gradually dims the light and lowers the music really helps my daughter drift off to sleep. What you should know though, is that the attachment is too short for our crib. My husband ended up having to unstitch the strap in order for it to be long enough. The turtle in the middle also squeaks as it moves but it is not loud enough for my daughter to wake up. Not a real deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: MLam

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit on standard cribs
customer_reviews.text: Most cribs these days have the wider top panels, not like the old-school ones. The strap is not long enough to fasten. Other than that it works great and it's very cute. I just have to figure out someway to fasten it to the crib
customer_reviews.author: amazongirl

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: My twin babies seem to like it better than I do...I’m not impressed with how loud it is (had to tape over the speaker), and one of the little critters on the “screen” makes a horrible squeaking sound as it goes round. It drives me nuts- like nails on a chalk board. The babies will sit and stare and anything that lights up though so it’s okay, I guess; just wish it was a little better quality. I like my Fisher Price one better.
customer_reviews.author: DB Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I like the toy itself, or rather my grandson does. The issue I had was it didn't work when it arrived, so of course I checked the batteries. I found them all leaky and rusted. I'd rather them not include batteries than to send them rusted (see pics). As for the toy itself, I wish I'd bought it when my grandson was younger. He loves it. He's now 1 and at that age where he throws everything out of his crib. Since this attaches to the crib he can't toss it out and actually lays down and watches it.
customer_reviews.author: Roxief

customer_reviews.title: Detaches SUPER easily
customer_reviews.text: It does not latch on securely to the crib. It easily detaches with a simple kick underneath the aquarium. My 7 month old daughter knocked it loose twice last night with simple playing. While she ABSOLUTELY LOVES the music and the lights (And the ability to turn the music on whenever she wants), i do not feel it is safe to leave unattended in her crib. She is a smaller baby, and still her simple kicks knock it loose. I double checked the instructions to make sure I was attaching it correctly and I am...it's just a really poor design. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Armynurse

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken? Product is great but buy elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived broken. The fish weren't moving and it would light up but didn't play music. I bought this one as a back up because our daughter soothes herself to sleep with the one that works every night, we even bring it on vacation with us. I didn't know this one was broken until couldn't return it anymore. When it works it is great. I bought it from Amazon because it was cheaper, but now I think I know why. I'm gonna go to babies r us or Walmart because I'd rather not pay half price for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: hlrravi

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! My son is usually super fussy at night and this helps calm him down. He loves to stare at it. It doesn't quite put him to sleep yet but he's only 3.5 months old so hopefully in the future months it will. For now, it helps as a little entertainment for him. The ocean sounds are very realistic and soothing even for me, lol. We also like the moving water effect it has, very cool. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: You go through batteries like crazy, remote barely goes 10ft, would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, batteries last maybe a few nights. Remote barely goes 10 ft away. It's a great music machine probably my favorite. But the batteries are expensive and the remote barely works. If it at least would be a plug in instead of battery powered would totally recommend and give 5 stars. But the main fact of the point is that no one wants to waste $30 a month on batteries for a music machine that doesn't even cost much itself.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Kac

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beating and keeps on working!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the 2nd one we bought. The first one that we bought more than three years ago was dropped down a flight of stairs during a move...and kept working for another year. Considering how often my son played this thing, and still does, it's a wonder it lasted as long as it did. Hopefully this new one won't be abused as much as the first one and will last until he thinks he's too cool for it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: Nice, just did not meet our needs
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would help my 1-year old go back to sleep at night, but my hope was misplaced! She does like to play with it during the day, but it is not the night savior we hoped for. It’s a great device, sound quality is good, and the lights are pretty. It takes C batteries, and I say this because 1. You will need lots and 2. The instructions are less then clear that this is what you need.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jessup

customer_reviews.title: Neat toy for kids that love underwater scenery
customer_reviews.text: Neat toy for kids that love underwater scenery. My daughter doesn't mind the white noise mode; the songs are basic and get repetitive over time. What bother me as a parent is that the toy is really only meant to be clipped to the top edge of a crib, and tips over too easily during free-play. Also, wears down battery quickly so I have resorted to 4xAA rechargeable in D- to AA- converter shells. D batteries don't really help with the bottom weight, so we use this mostly clipped on the crib.
customer_reviews.author: Marianna Mayilyan

customer_reviews.title: Toddler gives it 5, I give it 4
customer_reviews.text: Toddler loves it! It attaches to crib easily, easy for toddler and caregiver to figure out. Biggest complaint is battery life. Toddler loves it too much!! It’s on about 4-5 times a day for it’s full duration. Battery lasts about 1 1/2 months at most. I try to switch it into off mode during the day between naps but that hasn’t helped. We have had it for about a year and I feel like battery life is getting worse. It’s still great and worth it, just keep a store of D batteries around.
customer_reviews.author: SarahJoyce

customer_reviews.title: Great product for baby’s who are fussy when falling asleep.
customer_reviews.text: I added this to the end of my son’s bassinet to calm him before bed. Other reviewers mentioned a loud motor notice; however, the music is louder than the noise which drowns the motor noise out. I wouldn’t consider it an issue unless you don’t plan on using the music. My sons loves it and falls fast asleep watching it. I love that it has a self timer. The lights and movement stop after 20 minutes but the music continues to play. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: A&F

customer_reviews.title: Great for car rides
customer_reviews.text: We strapped this to the headrest of our car for our very intolerant infant for car rides in car seat. It works great. I love it has 2 volume levels so we can set in to a softer tone when we hope for her to sleep. It is a little heavy so you have to ensure that you have it secured very well! Batteries only lasted about 2 months for occasional (twice weekly use). It’s a little pricey but I can say I am please with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I have this connected to my daughters crib. Comes with batteries. You can choose the sound of crashing waves or actual songs. You can have the waves or the sound with, or without the blue lights. She loves the crashing waves sound, and it helps soothe her. She loves staring at the light. I like that it shuts off automatically after a certain time period. You can control it from a remote too if you want it turned back on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy the cheapest option.
customer_reviews.text: The machine worked as advertised, so far. The problem I have is that they didnt ship the plush toy as shown in the order. It's a toy, big deal. However, it was supposed to be included in the package as stated. If you're going to sell a package item, follow through with what you advertise.
customer_reviews.author: Bossai

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Very cute creatures and I love the ocean themed Baby Einstein characters, but the motor inside is LOUD. This is our 2nd purchase of this item after the first died after 2 years of daily use. Little guy loves it, but I think it could have been much better quality. We bought the 2016 version and then the 2018 version- old one was better. Older one had nicer songs and sound quality better.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Loos

customer_reviews.title: My Go-to baby gift
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these with my kids when they were babies and it was a life saver. We would hit the button for the music and lights every night and it got to be a bedtime constant. By the time they were 9 months old, if they would wake up in the middle of the night, they would hit the button and put themselves back to sleep. It was like Pavlov's law! Genius. It also has a remote you can hang on the door to turn it on from the door. I love this baby gadget!
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: We loved this at first but about 2 months ago it ...
customer_reviews.text: We loved this at first but about 2 months ago it started making a loud buzzing/annoying background noise. We tried to ignore it at first since my daughter loves it but finally stopped using it about a month ago. Tried calling the manufacturer but because of a long wait time, I hung up. For the price, it should last longer than 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: All my grandkids have loved this!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters both bought this for their children, and they have found it to be perfect for the crib. The kids love it. It really is soothing to listen to and to watch. I have subsequently bought this as a shower gift. Both my grandson and granddaughter liked to turn it on themselves as they got older. It is much more attractive than most crib items.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: The strap is far too short to fit many cribs.
customer_reviews.text: If you have anything other than a basic slat crib, this will not fit. The strap is simply too short. It is a gigantic oversight that the strap is not longer, and terrible that this has not been addressed by the manufacturer. It looks like a 1 inch nylon strap should fix it, assuming you buy one long enough, but what a huge hassle. Music, lights, everything else is nice. It is a little loud, a little bright and has a noisy motor. Can't speak to battery life since we just got it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect, needs some modifications
customer_reviews.text: The strap was not large enough to accommodate our crib, so we had find a large one to mount it. Secondly who seriously is going to replace 4 C batteries every couple of weeks??! The expense and aggravation... Snipped the end off an old cell phone charger and soldered to the device. Why this doesn't come with an AC adapter is just silly. However baby loves it. Puts her right to sleep...
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Best investment for baby bedtime.
customer_reviews.text: Baby absolutely loves this. Uses it every night! I've used it nightly for months and,ad soon as I set baby in crib she immediately reaches for the star to turn it on! It's a royal pain to change the batteries- you need a screwdriver. Not exactly the best design when you have a shrieking baby and a dead sea soother. Wish it had an option to plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett S.

customer_reviews.title: Too loud for a sleep soother
customer_reviews.text: My baby likes to play with this soother, turning the music on and off. However, I'm a bit disappointed that it either does not have a volume control- or the lower volume setting is still quite loud. It has a white noise option as well which is nice, but the loudness again is quite distracting- even for my son at 9 mos. Unfortunately, we got this when he was 6 months old and were not able to use it as a night time sleep aid. Rather it's just a play toy for when he wakes up.
customer_reviews.author: MinimalistMomTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his sea dreams baby aquarium! We all have fallen asleep to it when we are rocking my son to sleep before he goes in the crib. We use it mostly for him to get sleepy and not so much for when he is actually in his crib. It’s very easy to attach and detach form the crib, I would buy again to give as gift to expectant parents, a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra P.

customer_reviews.title: Okay, could use improvements
customer_reviews.text: My daughter seems to like this for the most part, it is easy to attach to her crib. I do have 3 complaints though...1) there should be a setting where the light turns on and the animals move without music or ocean sounds 2) I wish there was a lower volume setting because even the lowest one seems loud and 3) my remote won’t work if we haven’t used the machine in 2 hours so I have to turn it on and immediately off to “activate” the remote
customer_reviews.author: T M Lopes

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I have wanted it for a while ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I have wanted it for a while and finally just caved and bought it. My daughter is almost 1 year old but this is perfect for attaching to her crib to help her fall asleep. It is even peaceful for me to go to sleep. She loves the movement and sound. But it is not too bright to where she cannot go to sleep and you can adjust the volume. Music or sounds of the ocean. I love it and hopefully this will assist with the nap times that my daughter does not like to take...
customer_reviews.author: Heather De Vries

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend. Our lil guy love's it
customer_reviews.text: Ok, i depend on reviews most the time when buying but this one was hard cause there were a lot of good and bad ones. Well I chanced it and I'm glad I did! Our son loves it. He's almost 4 months. Only thing bad i have to say at all was it is loud. But nothing a lil clear tape over the speaker in back didn't fix!! Oh and I thought the batteries looked real cheap and might leak so i just replaced them. Hope this helps. Photos were all straight outta da box!
customer_reviews.author: Runnin'w/scissors

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 1 year old!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our 1 year old and was afraid it would be too "babyish" for her since most seem to buy it for younger babies. But my daughter loves it, can operate the on/off button and it gives us a little more time in the morning after she wakes up. We hear the music come on and know she's awake, but she'll play with it for a while before she wants us to come in and get her out of the crib :)
customer_reviews.author: samantha

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, but needs to improve on longevity.  Hopefully, this new one works better with less battery changes.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one as the first one, my son used so much, the motor is starting to slow down and studder. Also, we are changing the batteries now every 2 weeks. Pricey upkeep! We love this aquarium as it soothes our lil boy to sleep and brings him comfort and a lil light to his crib. The new one we just purchased has some updated tunes and brighter notes which we like. Hopefully, they've improved on battery life too.
customer_reviews.author: LisaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Works well as something to look at. Won't put your baby to sleep
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like the pictures, If not better. But that's all it's really good for. If your baby is very energetic, this won't put them to sleep. Better to spend your money on something else you'll actually use. But as for battery life, it lasts a good few days with moderate use, even on low batter it lasts a long time. Sound quality is good,not too loud or low. It can take a lot of hits from toys being thrown at it, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio & Ernesto Perez

customer_reviews.title: Baby Einstein, you out did yourself!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for the twins! They hook to the crib but the babies like to play with them out of the crib. It plays wonderful music and the visuals are beautiful. It has a volume button which is nice. It has many options. With music, without etc. Made very well. Bought another one for a shower gift. They loved it. This will be another shower gift go to in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lerch- Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Switch out battery that was supplied immediately
customer_reviews.text: Batteries that supplied with toy leaked and made toy useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase this if you want your child to fall asleep...
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to purchase this as I enjoy Baby Einstein videos and products. The fish that move are very loud and quite frankly not relaxing. Also, the light is way to bright and stimulating. This is not a soother, in my opinion, unless it is on the music-only setting. That it what we use and I only use it because I paid an arm and a leg for this. I wish I didn't force myself to use it. I see other soothers that may be a better option. A positive, of course, is that this could be a good toy for a baby. My baby enjoys following the fish with her fingers.
customer_reviews.author: WellMamma

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: this thing works awesome, my daughter was around 6 mo. old when my wife and I got it for her. she quickly learned to press the orange star fish to turn it on. if she wakes herself up at night she sometimes presses the button her self or I come in and press it for her. the blue light hypnotizes her and a few seconds later, she slams her head back to the bed and goes back to sleep. she is almost 1 and still have original batteries in.
customer_reviews.author: VRGuidry

customer_reviews.title: Every baby needs one!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this as a baby, very soothing. Now that he's a toddler, I love hearing on the monitor when he turns it on himself. It has several settings with/without lights, sound effects, music. So many choices. It's nice as a little bit of light in his dark room when he wakes up in the middle of the night, so he goes right back to sleep without fussing. We even bring it on vacation with us and he has no problem sleeping away from home.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Zaconie

customer_reviews.title: Older design was better.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this along with the v tech soother and I much prefer the v tech. I got this one as I had a similar one for my 10 year old but they have since changed the design. It isn't very interactive anymore. It used to have a button to turn the music on or off another button to activate lights and another for movement. Now one button turns it all on or off. I wish they still made the older version it was much better. This toys new design has made it less fun for babies and harder to use for parents.
customer_reviews.author: catlady

customer_reviews.title: Mysteries of the Deep
customer_reviews.text: The haters can say what they want, but thing is still a favorite in our household. I don’t get, but this thing mesmerizes our daughter. Even at 21 months our kid loves this thing. Maybe we don’t run it as much, but batteries actually don’t need to be replaced as frequently as others have suggested. Minus one star for the fact you can’t control brightness, volume has two options and the mechanical noise. That said it’s still our go to gift for friends having babies.
customer_reviews.author: The Book Bird

customer_reviews.title: Great but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This will not sooth your baby to sleep. It may entertain your baby so he/she will stay in bed but the volume is too loud and the lights cannot be dimmed. There is one song that is very energetic and lows playing in the mix which is not at all relaxing or soothing at all. If volume and lights were dimmable I would give this product the 5th star.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Lemon Product----buyer beware---UPDATE--- company very responsive and replacing toy, increased rating
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product....when it works. The original item worked initially, but after a few uses, the fish/turtle stopped moving. Thankfully that happened immediately, and I was able to exchange the product. The replacement product had the same problem after the 90 day warranty. Now I am stuck with an expensive light/noise maker. We thought the batteries kept going dead, but it was actually the product. Our little one still enjoyed the movement, lights, and noise (when it worked), and she is almost 8 months old. We used it for her morning nap so it didn't even get heavy usage. We are so disappointed. [FYI--it takes C batteries at almost $8/replacement...the cost adds up quickly).
customer_reviews.author: als

customer_reviews.title: So all of my children have loved having this
customer_reviews.text: So all of my children have loved having this, it really it such a great product for infants. unfortunately of the three I’ve ordered from here, only one worked perfectly. One began the make squeeking noises when the creatures moved after about three weeks of constant use. I got a replacement which was sent very promptly and the one I just received makes a loud humming noise when the light is on. I guess the twins will just share one!
customer_reviews.author: ratedspecialk

customer_reviews.title: Baby can learn to turn this on too!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice crib soother for baby. Easy for parents to turn on at night via base or the remote. Nice light feature to tap for quick light in the crib that goes out on its own. Sound options are good; I especially like the slow decline of the noise and light to help baby drift off. I would like to see more sound options for volume as sometimes I think its too loud. I would also like to see a light dimmer so you can adjust the light as well. My 8 month old can almost turn it on himself now. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Nedd

customer_reviews.title: Good for now, wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not too crazy for this and won't buy it again if it goes out. It technically works good, but leaves a lot to be desired: - The remote only works half of the time (basically when it feels like it) so it that's your reason for getting this, back away slowly. - The volume control has three settings - Crazy Loud, just under Crazy Loud, and off. To their credit, it slowly dims as it gets closer to auto shutoff, but it's still a bit too loud. That said, battery life is better than expected, and our son seems to like it when he's awake.
customer_reviews.author: RandomChill

customer_reviews.title: Great Crib Toy
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to set up and it works well. There are 2 sound settings. It comes with a remote in case it goes to sleep. The star at the bottom also turns it on and off. The orange button on the top turns the light on and off. There are 4 options. Sound, light, and movement then just light then just sound and then just movement. Its cute. I purchased the old version. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nelly B

customer_reviews.title: The soother resulted to be an excellent calmer for my kiddo and the music tone variation
customer_reviews.text: The soother resulted to be an excellent calmer for my kiddo and the music tone variation,fish mobile mode and even the light was an amazing delightful watch for my kiddo. i am certainly sure every infant would love this soother ,irrespective of day or night .After a good feeding,baby can be placed on the crib , left to enjoy this view ,the infant will fall asleep without any major effort required from the parent to sooth or rock or sing to the baby ,Yes an excellent soother it is . I found only one difficulty ,i.e w.r.t its batteries,wish it had lasted a bit longer these C batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Except the remote
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Using it without the lights helps my girl fall asleep, and she likes it with the lights if she wakes up early and wants to have some quiet play time before getting up for the day. Overall really love it! I wish the battery compartment was a bit easier to get to, and the remote works maybe 15% of the time, but still love it and find it worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I would have returned it but my daughter loved it so much
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this. She cannot go to bed the without it. My only complaint is it states it is "universal" and will fit any crib. This is not true. I just bought a standard crib from babies r us this year and it did not fit. When I called customer service they told me there was nothing they can do and this was "a common complaint." Luckily my dad can fix anything and made the strap bigger for me. I would have returned it but my daughter loved it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Drains Batters, My Remote Seems to Not Work Right
customer_reviews.text: This product goes through batteries so quickly. I recommend that you purchase rechargeable batteries when buying this product. Baby enjoys watching the lights and action but goes to sleep with the ocean sound. As other have mentioned, the low volume setting isn't very low but is great for drowning out other noises outside the nursery like my washer and dryer. Unfortunately, I'm having issues with the remote that some of my friends who also have this product do not have. Unless the soother has been on recently, the remote won't work and I have to manually turn it on even though I've changed the batteries. I'll still be keeping the product because it works for us.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana G.

customer_reviews.title: Seriously damaged box, slightly damaged but good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very entertaining for my 3 month old. The box came inside another but was still damaged heavily. The toy was slightly damaged but the functionality was not compromised do i didn't return it because I didn't have time. We used this for the first time while evacuating Florida last weekend. It was very helpful in those few hours he was restless. And the remote made it easy to turn back on from the front seat.
customer_reviews.author: TheGlenFam2010

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: My son hasn't been able to sooth himself to sleep with this yet but we are working up to it. If he's fighting sleep as I rock him I give him some alone time in his crib with this to mellow out and he lets me know when he wants rocked to sleep. I read some reviews saying it was too loud and some saying that it would be nice to have a battery low indicator. Mine has two volume settings and low battery light indicator so they must have read reviews and made improvements!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M

customer_reviews.title: I love the timer and the remote
customer_reviews.text: I love the timer and the remote! I like that you can turn the lights off and just have music, also I like the two different types of music (lullaby or ocean waves) I do wish I could extend the time longer than 10 minutes but that is all my baby needs! She loves watching it!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lucchesi

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, not for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great for entertaining your baby if you need a few extra minutes of sleep in the morning, or if they can't calm themselves down as you're putting them to bed. BUT, it definitely did not "lull" my baby to sleep. It's SO bright, especially if you're using it in a dark room, which I assume you would be because you're trying to get a baby to bed, and the first 10 minutes are quite loud as well. So if you're looking for a fun crib toy, I recommend. But if you're searching for something to help your baby fall asleep on their own, you should pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves it but hated it as a baby.
customer_reviews.text: This scares the snot out of my baby. He cried nonstop with it until I returned it. He's really pleased with the Fisher-Price Rainforest Waterfall Peek-a-Boo Soother, though. Two years later: Updating to say that although my son hated it as a baby, he loves it as a 2.5 year old. It's a little loud, but throw a piece of packing tape across the speaker and it's a good volume for going to sleep. This works well for pretty much anything with an out-of-sight speaker. Otherwise, my kid rips the tape off. It's got a good semi-hypnotic rhythm so it doesn't keep kids awake like some other ones we've tried.
customer_reviews.author: BioGeekMom

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the baby einstein aquarium for my daughter at 2 weeks old and she was mesmerized by it. She's now 13 months and still plays it all the time. I love the big starfish button that makes it easy to turn on herself. Before she could reach up and push it she would kick at her aquarium until it turned on. It's very durable! We couldn't be happier with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Another baby toy that makes noise
customer_reviews.text: It's basically white noise for babies. My daughter enjoys it, as she'll go to sleep watching the colors and listening to the sounds in her swing. She'll out grow it in less than 2 months, so just like all the other baby toys, it's good for 2ish months and then you'll give it away, or sell it for 50% at a yard sale.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a LIFESAVER for my family. Recently ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a LIFESAVER for my family. Recently we've been travelling upstate 3+ hours because we are moving, and the car rides were a nightmare until I got this little tank. Baby loves to watch it in the car and it keeps her entertained for hours on end. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: JB550

customer_reviews.title: Safety Warning
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing it has always kept my daughters attention even as a newborn. She loves it! Why the low rating you ask? Because although installed correctly my 5 month old was able to lift it up and it fell off onto the back of her head! It's pretty heavy too my poor baby was screaming uncontrollably for 30 minutes or so. The way you just lift it up off the base is not very safe if a 16 lb infant who can't even sit yet is able to do it. Horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Moonie

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but only one complain
customer_reviews.text: Our baby loves this stuff. There are many reviews about the short battery life but we use it on Pack n' Play in the living room where he only spends about a few hours/day so we have changed the batteries just once in the last 4 months. I give a lot of credit to a person who designed it. It's brilliant. My only complain is one of the tunes they chose, "Für Elise". Why did they use a song in minor keys for a baby toy??
customer_reviews.author: TKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Baby and Mothers dream
customer_reviews.text: I love this and it has come along way since my first child. It has a button that the baby easily figured out and a remote for before they do. Also the new way to attach to the crib makes it easy to change the batteries. I also love how it has an auto shut off to add battery life
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: A member of the family
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our baby girl somewhere around 2 month old and it worked wonders out of the gate. (During early shushing and womb sound phases). Now it's a daily staple for her. You can use the ocean waves or music with lights on or off in both modes which is super handy to change up the monotony. We love the songs and dance to them often. She's 18 months old now and it's her cast of characters when she goes to sleep. We often hear her turn the music on when she needs to self sooth and it's no coincidence "turtle" is her most well pronounce word. Can't imagine life without it.
customer_reviews.author: Glen C.

customer_reviews.title: Second Purchase of This Amazing Crib Toy
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this toy, its that great! I got the second one for a new baby because his 2 year old brother would never part with his.After reading reviews of the larger one made by the same company, I realized I needed to stick with the one I knew about. After almost 3 years the first one works perfect and still helps its owner fall to sleep. The turtle moves around and it has the illusion of water and bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer57

customer_reviews.title: Seems like offering other attachment options or adapters would be the ...
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it and we haven’t had any mechanical issues so far (after 6 months). The crib attachment is bizarre, as several other people have mentioned. It (sort of?) works on our crib but once we drop her mattress down she won’t be able to see it anymore. My only guess is they tried to make an attachment that would work with the most cribs possible and this strange strap thingy is what they came up with. Seems like offering other attachment options or adapters would be the thing to do, but they don’t offer such things.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Baby is asleep in 5 minutes!
customer_reviews.text: I simply love it! It would normally take me at least 15 min to get my son to fall asleep despite him being on a schedule. Now, five minutes after I turn the sea dreams soother on he is asleep! It's like magic! On top of that, he would let me put him to sleep in his crib (he still sleeps with us as he is 3 months old). He immediately calms down as soon as he hears the classical music and he gets hypnotized by the sea animals. The only down side is the battery life. Four C batteries would only last a week but it is worth it! So overall I'm really happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina P.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great for newborns. We started using this aquarium since day one. My baby is 3 years old now and it’s still his favorite thing to help him fall asleep
customer_reviews.author: rama

customer_reviews.title: Music has changed from the old version :(
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this twice before and loved it. This one is a new version with different music, which might be fine except that it's a replacement for an older one for my 3 year old and she is NOT interested in the new music. She uses it to go to sleep, if she wakes up in the night, in the morning...will now be trying to figure out how to fix the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best $39 I have ever spent
customer_reviews.text: The best $39 I have ever spent. Seriously. BUY THIS IS YOU ARE HAVING A HARD TIME WITH SEEP TRAINING. It helped tremendously. Our 6M was having a hard time sleeping on his own in his crib, but a friend recommended this product. First night we used it we laid him down in his crib sleepy, but awake. He looked at his fishy tank till he drifted off to sleep. Zero fuss. Granted not every nigh has been that perfect since we purchased it, BUT it helps every single time. It's apart of his nightly routine. If he does fuss its only for a minute and the relaxing music and lights help self soothe him to sleep. GET IT.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Soother
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for about a month and so far we love it. I bought it to replace an older soother that was similar but only ran for five minutes before shutting off. My 18 month old loves this new soother. It plays music for a full 30 minutes which is plenty of time for her to fall asleep. It has 4 modes: music and lights, music only, ocean sounds and lights, or ocean sounds only. It was very easy to install on the crib and easy to remove. We've been using it for a month at every bedtime and just had to change the batteries today, so battery life is pretty good too. Overall a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: RC Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Bought for my 1 year old who still doesn't sleep through the night. He wakes up and can turn it on himself which helps him go back to sleep. It has several settings so you can adjust it to what you need. The only negative is that it went through batteries pretty quickly, but we use it A LOT! I liked it so much that I bought one for my cousin who is having a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Sea Dreams saves the day
customer_reviews.text: This has saved the day enough to pay for itself several times over. The light can be bright enough to be too distracting for sleep but it dims automatically after a few minutes. Mounts easily on the crib rail. My 9 month boy turns it on when he has troubles sleeping. It blows my mind he knows to press the button but it means I get to sit and enjoy my little time of peace while he figures out his sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good. The strap needs to be longer
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. The strap needs to be longer. We could't put in on the part of the crib that we wanted because there is a trim piece under the railing that is rainbow shaped. Had to end up installing this in the middle of the bed rather than at one end because the strap wasn't long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hart

customer_reviews.title: Ou granddaughter loves her aquarium
customer_reviews.text: Our little granddaughter just loves her aquarium! She was in the NICU for months but the hospital had one of these and she really took to it. Now she’s almost 2 and still loves going to sleep to this. Very calming and the music is great. The remote helps when she’s close to sleep and you want to turn this in without a fuss. Really great!
customer_reviews.author: StevenJM

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for my granddaughters 1st Birthday. She loves it and it helps her fall asleep. She caught on very quickly on how to turn it on. Works well at night when she wakes up as the baby monitor picks it up and alerts her parents that she is awake. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry E

customer_reviews.title: Loud whirring motor sound
customer_reviews.text: Defective product. Replaced this twice. First one, none of the parts moved and there was a loud whirring sound as if the motor inside was struggling. Second one, the parts moved but again, there was a whirring sound and this time, we also heard clicking. Third one, same loud whirring sound. The hospital where my daughter was born had one of these and she loved it. That one worked fine. Don't know what's up with these but the sound is very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amber C

customer_reviews.title: it would be PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! He stares at it and will stay in his crib until the sound stops. Only reason I gave it 4 stars, is because the volume is REALLY loud, even when it is in low (only two volume options). If they had the option to make it even lower, it would be PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Atxadri

customer_reviews.title: To have broken on me
customer_reviews.text: This stop working after being used for a year or so... We purchased a second one because my daughter had gotten used to it being part of her bedtime routine, and the second one we purchased a second one because my daughter had gotten used to it being part of her bedtime routine, and the second one didn’t last us the full year.
customer_reviews.author: J. Minnick

customer_reviews.title: Mesmerizing!
customer_reviews.text: I had this same crib toy 7 years ago for my daughter and ended up selling it last year because it was collecting dust in my basement. My sister found out she was pregnant a few months later and of course I had to buy her this lifesaver again for her baby shower! It lasted me many years and still worked perfectly when I sold it, and I’m expecting this one to be of the same quality. We’re very happy! Babies are absolutely mesmerized by this thing!!
customer_reviews.author: Vixey

customer_reviews.title: Love this soother
customer_reviews.text: Love this soother. It doesn't have water in it but it looks exactly like reflections from water when it's running. The music comes on at a higher volume at first and then goes to a more quiet setting after a few minutes so the turn off is not so jarring. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Christy-Glover

customer_reviews.title: The one that all babies seem to love!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen this colorful musical aquarium toy so many times that I bought one for my 6 month old grandson. It keeps babies fascinated for long periods of time, & can also be hooked onto the crib. The fish swim, the water lights up, and the music is so soothing. It's the best gift I've ever given!
customer_reviews.author: Gemlovr

customer_reviews.title: Great Product with one major drawback...
customer_reviews.text: Lights, music, soothing ocean sounds, and animated underwater friends make for a great baby soother. You can choose whether to have everything going on at once, or select any one or two to help baby fall asleep. The one major drawback? While baby can turn the soother on by touching (or, more likely, kicking) the starfish, they can also turn it off by hitting it repeatedly. Can make for a frustrated baby if they turn it off and then can't figure out how to turn it back on. Still, this is a great product and it comes with a remote so you can turn it back on from across a room if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: jjack929

product_meta.title: Baby Einstein Sea Dreams Soother
product_meta.description:
Style:SeaDreams SootherThe Baby Einstein Explore & Discover Soft Blocks are made for little hands to squeeze, stack, toss and tumble. Each colorful block is a powerful discovery tool with multi-sensory activity that your baby will love. Discover the baby-safe mirror tucked under the peek-a-boo sun. Embark on a sensory safari with the wildlife rattle block and see animal names in English, Spanish and French. Tug on the friendly frog’s leg and watch it spring back! Every block is made to engage and entertain baby, and their soft design makes this an ideal activity for quiet places.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Soft lights and 25 plus minutes of classical music will soothe baby to sleep with the Sea Dreams Soother. The unique underwater light effect, motion of the baby Neptune characters, and real life imagery will help calm baby. The unique drift off feature gradually softens music every 10 minutes to help baby fall asleep. There are 4 soothing modes: melodies-lights-motion, melodies only, ocean sounds-lights-motion, and ocean sounds only. The universal perfect fit crib attachment allows it to fit most crib rails and the soother can also be used bedside for toddlers.
feature_bullets: Discover animal names in 3 languages.Fits most crib rails with approximate circumference of 10.5 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,894 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
